snippet: Intuit, the company that makes Quicken personal finance software, announced at the end of January that it was working on an edition of the program that would work on Mac computers running the latest version of Mac OS X. It is expected this spring.
abstract: Intuit, the company that makes Quicken personal finance software, announced at the end of January that it was working on an edition of the program that would work on Mac computers running the latest version of Mac OS X. It is expected this spring.
